```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  # fig.path = "man/figures/README-",
  out.width = "100%"
)
options(tibble.print_min = 5, tibble.print_max = 5)
```

Die Website mit Zugang zum Tool ist hier zu finden: https://meikesteinhilber.github.io/otter/
